metadata.name: Gpscript Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the LOLBIN gpscript, which executes logon or startup scripts configured in Group Policy

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\gpscript.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('gpscript.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /logon')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /startup'))) AND NOT lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\svchost.exe -k netsvcs -p -s gpsvc'))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the LOLBIN gpscript, which executes logon or startup scripts configured in Group Policy

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate uses of logon scripts distributed via group policy References: https://oddvar.moe/2018/04/27/gpscript-exe-another-lolbin-to-the-list/, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Gpscript/
